Class ScoreCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScoreCard

  • public class ScoreCard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a Yahtzee score card. It is composed of several scorelines (both in ArrayList and individual form) as well as upper and lower scorecard 'total's (int). There are also ints to keep track of how many bonus Yahtzees have been scored CPSC 224 Assignment #1 No sources to cite.
    See Also:
    ScoreLine

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScoreCard

        public ScoreCard(int diceInPlay,
                 int sidesOnDice)
        Constructor for a ScoreCard. The card is constructed dynamically as a function of how many dice are in play and how many sides are on a dice. These two parameters dictate what fields will appear on the card.
        Parameters:
        diceInPlay - is passed to this method from the YahtzeePlayer class.
        sidesOnDice - is passed to the method from the YahtzeeDie class.
